Name: Unyielding Oath
Description: When charging a Ground Pound, you become Invulnerable for 3 seconds.

Name: Adrenaline Boost
Description: After a perfectly timed Parry, Block or Dodge, you do not lose control upon taking Heavy Hits, and you cannot be knocked back for 10 seconds

Name: Duellist
Description: Perfect Parry and Perfect Block windows increase by 25%

Name: Fortitude
Description: Health increase by 15%

Name: Scrambled Targeting
Description: If you are surrounded by 5 or more enemies, you take 20% less Damage from Ranged Attacks

Name: Practiced Aim
Description: Ranged Damage increase by 15%

Name: Commendation
Description: Revive a Squad Member fully restores Jump Pack's Charge and all Armour Segments

Name: Auxiliary Reload
Description: Melee kills of Extremis-level or higher enemies restore your Primary Weapon's Ammo by 1 Magazine

Name: Resilience
Description: Medicae Stimms restore 40% more Health

Name: Overcharge
Description: Charged Attack Damage increases by 20%

Name: Powerful Shot
Description: Ranged Damage increases by 20%

Name: Masterful Defence
Description: Ability Charge is restored by 1% for every blocked Ranged Attack

Name: Standard Bearer
Description: When Chapter Banner activates, you become Invulnerable to Damage for 2 seconds

Name: Emboldened Stand
Description: When the Chapter Banner is active, all Squad Members do not lose control upon taking Heavy Hits and cannot be knocked back within its zone.

Name: Reverberating Impact
Description: Stomp area-of-effect radius increases by 50%

Name: Auxiliary Reload
Description: Any kills of Extremis-level or higher enemies restore your Primary Weapon's Ammo by 1 Magazine

Name: Conviction
Description: When your Armour is fully depleted, you take 25% less Health Damage for 10 seconds

Name: Exponential Force
Description: Melee Damage increases by 100%

Name: Indomitable Spirit
Description: While performing a Gun Strike, you do not lose control upon taking Heavy Hits, and you cannot be knocked back

Name: Honed Precision
Description: Equipped Weapon's Maximum Spread decreases by 25% when firing without aiming.

Name: Duellist
Description: Perfect Parry and Perfect Block windows increase by 25%

Name: Emperor's Grace
Description: When Camo Cloak activates, you become Invulnerable to Damage

Name: Versatile Precision
Description: Performing a kill with your Secondary Weapon restores 15% of your Primary Weapon's Ammo. Cooldown is 15 seconds

Name: Material Upgrade
Description: Equipment Damage radius increases by 15%

Name: Versatility
Description: After switching Weapons, your Secondary Weapon does 20% more Damage. The effect lasts until reloading or switching back to your Primary Weapon

Name: Indomitable Spirit
Description: While performing a Gun Strike, you do not lose control upon taking Heavy Hits and you cannot be knocked back

Name: Conviction
Description: When your Armour is fully depleted, you take 25% less Health Damage for 15 seconds

Name: Exacting Focus
Description: After a Gun Strike, you deal 20% more Ranged Damage for 10 seconds

Name: Acuity
Description: Each consecutive Headshot increases Headshot Damage by 3%, up to 15%. The bonus lasts 5 seconds without a Headshot

Name: Skilled Supplier
Description: Ammo Reserve increases by 15%

Name: Second Look
Description: If no enemy has been scanned by the time the Auspex Scan zone disappears, Auspex Scan's Charge is restored

Name: Spare Power
Description: Collecting an Ammo box restores Ability Charge by 25%

Name: Resilience
Description: Medicae Stimms restore 40% more Health

Name: Fortitude
Description: Health increases by 15%

Name: Exigency Charge
Description: When your Health is less than 25%, Ability Charge regenerates 15% faster

Name: Battlefield Awareness
Description: If a target is within 8 meters, you deal 10% more Ranged Damage

Name: Exigency Charge
Description: When your Health is less than 25%, Ability Charge regenerates 15% faster

Description: While performing a Gun Strike, you do not lose control upon taking Heavy Hits, and you cannot be knocked back

Name: Launch Restoration
Description: Using the Grapnel Launcher restores 1 Armour Segment

Name: Restoration
Description: Killing 7 enemies in rapid succession restores 1 Armour Segment. Cooldown is 15 seconds
